vsParam:
Please allow me to make a self-introduction.
My name is Nelke von Lestamm.

In the world where I come from, I was the
Administrator of a place called Westwald.

Von... Les... tamm?
Uh, er. Nelke, right! I got it!

Your family name has a von in it, and you are a land manager...
So it means, you are a noble person with a high status!?

Such a person just came to our world!?
I-I'm getting nervous...

Ho ho, although Lestamm is a prestigious old family,
I'm just a young girl who just graduated.

We are about the same age.
Please don't be too formal with me.

Yeah! I'm very happy to make
friends of my age!

Hey, [px]!
You are being too casual. Don't you think!?

Ho ho, [px]
is an interesting person.

Anyway, I'm glad you are an easy-going person.
Nice to meet you, too, Nelke!

Please feel free to approach us if we can help you
with anything. We'd be more than happy to do that!

Anyway... Nelke, you don't seem shocked
after being sent to a different world.

Ah, hmm... I am shocked. It's just that I have seen many
people from other worlds visiting mine...
But I didn't expect myself to be sent to a different world.

Actually, when I think about it, this could be a very
precious experience. Ho ho, I can learn many things...

Uh. So you are inured to different worlds!?
And you are so optimistic...

Optimistic... Ho ho, you are right. Although I worry about Westwald,
it should be OK since there are other people back home.

It would be meaningless for me to think too much,
and there's no annoying supervisor here...

You have a supervisor!?
Your job is hard, Nelke...

No, the job itself is not hard.
It is rational for administrators to be scrutinized.

But that guy laughs loudly and that annoys me...
Finally, I can get some silence here...
I-I still feel that your work is so hard!

Anyway... It's a rare chance for me to come to a
different world. I believe that I can learn much here.

Before I find a way to go back to my world.
Please allow me to study in the Academy...

Sure, you are more than welcome!
Please join us and study together!

Ho ho, thank you.
I'm more than glad to join you guys!
